wikitext.*:
'''Nórui''' is the sixth month of the calendar of the [[Dúnedain]]. It was also called [[Nárië]] in [[Quenya]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref> The first element of the name, ''Nór-'', is derived from Sindarin ''naur'' "fire".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''naur''. {{PE|17}} p. 38.</ref> The second element ''-ui'' is a common adjectival ending,<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 87.</ref> also present in other Sindarin names of the months.<ref>Cf. [[Nínui]], [[Urui]], [[Hithui]].</ref>
